step1.para: If previously removed, install the small O-ring in the bore of the cylinder housing ( inset, Figure 231). Position the corresponding new gasket on the housing mounting surface and install the deep reduction cylinder housing in the rear bore of the auxiliary housing, air channel to the right.

figure.caption: Figure 230. Install Small O-Ring in Cylinder Housing Bore, and Position New Gasket on Housing Mounting Surface

step1.para: If previously removed, install the O-ring in the groove of the yoke bar piston ( Figure 232).

figure.caption: Figure 231. Install O-Ring in Groove of Yoke Bar Piston

step1.para: Place the reduction yoke into position with the sliding clutch, lockscrew hole to the front ( Figure 233). From the rear of the auxiliary housing, insert the yoke bar through the cylinder bore and into yoke, aligning the notch in the bar with the yoke lockscrew hole.

figure.caption: Figure 232. Place Reduction Yoke into Position With Sliding Clutch

step1.para: Install the yoke lockscrew, tighten and wire securely ( Figure 234).

figure.caption: Figure 233. Install Yoke Lockscrew, Tighten and Wire Securely

step1.para: For models so equipped, install the insert valve in the bottom exhaust port of the cylinder cover as shown ( left, Figure 235). Install the valve retaining nut in the exhaust port of the cover and tighten to recommended torque ratings ( right, Figure 235).

figure.caption: Figure 234. Install Insert Valve and Valve Retaining Nut

note.para: Prior to installation of the insert valve, apply a small amount of silicone lubricant to the O-rings on the O.D. of the valve.

step1.para: Position the new gasket on the cover mounting surface and install the deep reduction cylinder cover, aligning the air channel with the channel in the cylinder housing ( Figure 236). Tighten the bolts to secure the cover to the cylinder housing.

figure.caption: Figure 235. Install Deep Reduction Cylinder Cover
